Detailed Description

Offers a notebook with page mapping and interfaces with wxExManagedFrame.

Member Function Documentation

wxWindow* wxExNotebook::AddPage ( wxWindow *  page,
const wxString &  key,
const wxString &  text = wxEmptyString,
bool  select = false,
const wxBitmap &  bitmap = wxNullBitmap 
)

Adds the page with given key and fills the map.

If the key already exists, NULL is returned, and no new page is added.

bool wxExNotebook::ForEach ( int  id)

Do something for each page in the notebook.

The pages should all be castable to wxExSTC pages. The id should be inbetween ID_ALL_LOWEST and ID_ALL_HIGHEST. Cannot be const as it can call DeletePage.

const wxString wxExNotebook::GetKeyByPage ( wxWindow *  page) const

Returns the key specified by the given page.

If the page does not exist an empty string is returned.

wxWindow* wxExNotebook::GetPageByKey ( const wxString &  key) const

Returns the page specified by the given key.

If the key does not exist NULL is returned.

int wxExNotebook::GetPageIndexByKey ( const wxString &  key) const

Returns the page index specified by the given key.

If the key does not exist -1 is returned.

wxWindow* wxExNotebook::InsertPage ( size_t  page_idx,
wxWindow *  page,
const wxString &  key,
const wxString &  text = wxEmptyString,
bool  select = false,
const wxBitmap &  bitmap = wxNullBitmap 
)

Inserts the page with given key and fills the map.

If the key already exists, NULL is returned, and no new page is added.

wxWindow* wxExNotebook::SelectPage ( const wxString &  key)

Selects (and returns) the page specified by the given key.

If the key does not exist NULL is returned.

bool wxExNotebook::SetPageText ( const wxString &  key,
const wxString &  new_key,
const wxString &  text,
const wxBitmap &  bitmap = wxNullBitmap 
)

Sets the pagetext for the given new key, on the page for the given key.

If the key does not exist false is returned.
